documents.document: @philiplyth @rnz_news thanks Philip!
When the photographer (@bexparsonsking) asks you to pose to check the lighting, and you SUCK at posing. https://t.co/VrI6ZCGLza
You're all wonderful, though not at all helpful in reaching a consensus.
Twitter - if I am "Jzujing up" something, how the hell do I spell it? Do we have a consensus on this yet?
It has been pointed out to me (by @MaxBentleyTowle) that Birthday Week is actually 8 days long. Ooops.
Day 2 of bday week. My treat is a day full of meetings. But my desk is full of packages from some accidental boozed shopping, so win!
I just found a recipe for kale pesto. @smrtgirl is going to be stoked.
One more time for those in the back: democracy, government, equal rights, and Edmund Burke quotes #polsnerd… https://t.co/R825mgQLvo
@bootstheory I have one of my own, there’s beer, and terrible puns.
@bootstheory Look, just because your mind is in the gutter, young lady.
WAY TO MAKE IT HARD, GUYS.
WHAT THE ACTUAL ETC. #cricket
@aaronbirdnz you might want to turn it back on.
There is a lot of swearing happening in our lounge RN. #BlackCaps
@smrtgirl @hadyngreen @southstarbrew brining is the business!
@hadyngreen @southstarbrew When me and @smrtgirl researched #chickenscience, all the relevant info was that beer ca… https://t.co/VZ9xdluQaZ
I’ve been doing a lot of thinking of late about what democracy means. Our @radionz podcast with @VicUniWgtn. https://t.co/lXOruxytCn
@EleanorAingeRoy Thank you!
@CnrJoe I don’t actually know what it was - I generally have about 7 FB tabs open.
"I think it’s easy for us to underestimate the battles that women all over the world went through to win the vote.… https://t.co/RNMXTUkMZl
I am working from home today. @DemiseG has the cricket playing in the other room. It’s easy to tell when I need to go see what happened.
@CMRanapia I'm going to go again at first opportunity.
@nikinajar dude, I started sobbing about a minute in.

“Not because we wear skirts but because we wear glasses."
😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍😍
When in doubt, take your bestie to a movie about awesome women. #hiddenfigures https://t.co/z6s1Hxx7Fp
Came to the pub to do work. Real hard to concentrate though, when all you want to do is headband along to this https://t.co/kgVONhOJ8P
@thelemonofpink if you find out how, pls let me know.
It’s finally summer. https://t.co/ePRvfeUppB
@conroynz @publicaddress @SoonLeeNZ he’s basically a hobbit. Not pictured: terrifying feet.
Finally. https://t.co/iDzeVkUsa1
There’s no way this is going to end badly, right, @conroynz? https://t.co/JvC1D0BcXG
There’s a moment when I actually say “meanwhile, I have to remember I’m on the radio right now.” https://t.co/iY2jI30qdN
@JoeDescartes it’s more lawnmowing and weed-whacking, but yes. But complaining would require getting out of bed.
I’ve complained about this before, but the church over the road using power tools before 8 on a Saturday morning is Not Very Christian, tbh.
@SusieFergusonNZ @JMulliganRNZ I tried to find you to tell you it was happening! I will work on Martin to get some for @NZMorningReport.
Finishing with kittens in the studio was the best end to a bloody great week. Thank you everyone who has listened! https://t.co/841Cj3B3E7
@slow_tri_guy @radionz thank you!
When you accidentally hit on the guest, and the EP says in your ear "stop trying to get dates." 😊 @ICaitlinCherry
@longlostleah @radionz @sadydoyle thank _you_ - it is such a great book!
@hopburnsblack @Garage_Project and you! I’m told @ZyanMc wants some hot sauce.
@LaurieFleming tell you what, @JohnJCampbell has barely aged. Flick on @CheckpointRNZ you’ll see what I mean.
@QueenofCobden I remember now why she was so terrifying to interview!
This pic tho. https://t.co/806oNqDw5R https://t.co/4aHpK8iU0A
Oi, beer peeps - @hopburnsblack on air now - plus a shout out for @Garage_Project. https://t.co/Pn2yVK5S8v
@jonogaluszka @phil_cook thanks team!
ON a completely different topic - beer peeps - how many 'craft' breweries in the Wellington area, and in NZ?
Me and @ICaitlinCherry give the radio a thumbs up. (sigh.)
.@ninetonoon plays the #marytylermoore song. Kathryn says "I have tears in my eyes. So does every woman journalist in the country, probably"
It shouldn’t need saying, but don’t do this. https://t.co/v5TdwIUOZG
@JMulliganRNZ @Neville_Vedder @radionz I don’t know why I didn’t think to ask that. That’s an outrage!
@JohnJCampbell @CMRanapia @publicaddress me three. And showed me that a woman could do it. (And Murphy Brown.)
@ICaitlinCherry @radionz I’m going to do exactly the same in five minutes.
(This is the brilliant artist I mentioned in that I/V: https://t.co/U2ehUqyfYd)
I am now on the @mlle_elle octopus-loving bandwagon, I tell you what. https://t.co/bqZYPRdCAa https://t.co/BlOQsBicrd
I would happily have paid more, but apparently studios think women won’t buy merch from the movies they love.
This was such a great interview. Marama was so open and brave. ❤️ https://t.co/GzYTjS0DBz
@juliefairey aw, thak you very much!
NGL, playing Waterfalls on @radionz ticks off a couple of items on my todo list.
It's bloody @damianchristie on @JMulliganRNZ picking his fave album RN. <3
@seawall and I was carrying several bags!
Relatedly, today was a terrible day to wear a short dress.
This time last year I was sunburnt from frolicking too long on the beach. Today: threatening clouds. https://t.co/rpaVuneJfN
@kimbakerwilson @rnz_birds yeah, it’s a bot - I’m looking into it. Just a little busy this week. :)
@LizzieMarvelly @bryce_edwards also surely it would create an environment ripe for corruption?
@LeilaniJM mate, I will send this inedible brick up, happily.
@LeilaniJM Just think, this way you don’t have to be sad that I didn’t send some up.
@LeilaniJM it’s OK, I burned them and used far too dark chocolate anyway, so they’’re basically inedible.
If I’m making vegan brownies, could I substitute almond milk for soy milk?
@danslevin so lovely to have you in - I was so excited I forgot to read the scripted intro.
Also a _bloody_ good chat - live radio is tiring.
Who wants to drive me to Karori to visit Mrs Chippy? (Bllody great chat with @ellamorton and @dylanthuras: https://t.co/0V9LliemMV)
@CarolHirschfeld @radionz Thank you!
@HamishMack Why, thank you!
@alactor thank you!
@ConcordDawnNZ we're talking about you on @jmulliganrnz - is it true one of your albums was made on a Playstation console?
@GrumpyYetAmusin We've got 6-4 covered pretty well this week.
My morning. @JMulliganRNZ makes you learn lots of new things. https://t.co/s9wj0ibeyk
Listening to @DemiseG watch tv/sport might be more entertaining than watching said programme.
@rjcroy bloody excellent. Though seriously, I don’t want you to get sick of my voice!
Ok, but how did I get on this spam list? https://t.co/mzigBkcA04
"The easiest way to take away someone's power is to convince them they don't want it." ~ @sadydoyle. https://t.co/PxKx47Ylu9
If you're not bored of my voice (and I would not at all blame you if you were,) this is a really fun listen. https://t.co/PxVBirgKzB
@JohnJCampbell @CheckpointRNZ @nzdodo @gemmagracewood I once asked Jolisa if they’d adopt me because they’re all so very cool.
@JohnJCampbell @CheckpointRNZ @nzdodo and @gemmagracewood reported for us too. What a family!
@nikoelsen @BeeFaerie @radionz aw, thank you very much!
Speaking to @sadydoyle about trainwrecks and women and internet bullying was A+++ https://t.co/PxKx47Ylu9

@emmawehipeihana @LucyZee_ yes! https://t.co/EKRVIRvmIY + a country version https://t.co/GQwSeQuUEQ (and a classical work in progress)
I spent several hours looking at various #WomensMarch hashtags. Thanks for the pics, @gemmagracewood !… https://t.co/ODpTAth3Df

We're gonna need this on a t-shirt. https://t.co/01NosYNuBG
@southstarbrew @nitzm soz team, I’ve been out of reception - I hope it was tasty!

@AMidnightVoyage @Sophia_Duckor looking forward to it!
.@DemiseG and @dmaoatecox just sent out emails about their impending departures, and now I am having a bad day at work.
